PageWidgetPortable.Title: ATIVIDADES
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.DIRETOR_REGIONAL.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.RESPONSAVEL IN (SELECT USUARIO FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOEMPRESAFILIAIS WHERE FILIAL = @FILIAL) AND A.PESSOA IN (SELECT CODIGO FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS WHERE FILIAL=@FILIAL)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO/form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.DIRETOR_RELACIONAMENTO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.RESPONSAVEL IN (SELECT USUARIO FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOEMPRESAFILIAIS WHERE FILIAL = @FILIAL) AND A.PESSOA IN (SELECT CODIGO FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS WHERE FILIAL=@FILIAL) AND A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT DISTINCT(HANDLE) FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL V JOIN STRING_SPLIT ((SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(K_VERTICALPRODUTO,0, LEN(K_VERTICALPRODUTO)-1), '|', ''),'_',',') FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO), ',') ON VALUE = V.HANDLE)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO/form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GERENTE_PRODUTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT DISTINCT(HANDLE) FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL V JOIN STRING_SPLIT ((SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(K_VERTICALPRODUTO,0, LEN(K_VERTICALPRODUTO)-1), '|', ''),'_',',') FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO), ',') ON VALUE = V.HANDLE)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO/form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.CANAIS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.PESSOA IN (SELECT PESSOA FROM K_CRM_PESSOAVERTICAL WHERE FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS WHERE K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S') GROUP BY PESSOA)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO/form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
